snippet: As deliberations began in the trial of Barbara Sheehan, who killed her husband in 2008, an alternate juror said she would have voted to acquit the woman of murder.
lead_paragraph: As deliberations began in the trial of Barbara Sheehan, who killed her husband in 2008, an alternate juror said she would have voted to acquit the woman of murder.

headline.main: Jury Begins Deliberating in the Killing of a Husband
headline.print_headline: Jury Starts Deliberations In the Killing Of a Husband
headline.seo: Jury Begins Deliberating in Barbara Sheehan’s Murder Trial
